name: Rockotto no Densetsu
description:
A puzzle game about space and rockets. Guide Rockotto to the objective using antennas all around the solar system.

This game was developed for the Global Game Jam 2018, our very first jam, by Maxence "Az-steak" Deschamps, Clément Patricio and Kevin "130N35" Penin.

Link to the Global Gam Jam page
